analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/11/0x48a7d5aee0c6a79ccead5c859ca965c87718cf40.sol:
	Contract Citizen has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/11/0x48a7d5aee0c6a79ccead5c859ca965c87718cf40.sol#218)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/11/0x48a7d5aee0c6a79ccead5c859ca965c87718cf40.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.18 (/unique_chucks/11/0x48a7d5aee0c6a79ccead5c859ca965c87718cf40.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/11/0x48a7d5aee0c6a79ccead5c859ca965c87718cf40.sol#88) is not in mixedCase
